#summary Composition technique.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !CreateCompositionTechniqueTextureDefinition(string name, real technique_id, real width, real height, real pixel_format) ===
----
Creates a new local texture definition and returns the ID.
====Parameters====
   * _technique_id_ - The ID of the technique.
   * _name_ - The unique name of the local texture.
   * _width_, _height_ - The dimensions of the local texture.
   * _pixel_format_ - The internal texture format you wish to create; the manager reserves the right to create a different format if the one you select is not available in this context. Can be:
      * global.PF_UNKNOWN
      * global.PF_L8
      * global.PF_L16
      * global.PF_A8
      * global.PF_A4L4
      * global.PF_BYTE_LA
      * global.PF_R5G6B5
      * global.PF_B5G6R5
      * global.PF_A4R4G4B4
      * global.PF_A1R5G5B5
      * global.PF_R8G8B8
      * global.PF_B8G8R8
      * global.PF_A8R8G8B8
      * global.PF_A8B8G8R8
      * global.PF_B8G8R8A8
      * global.PF_A2R10G10B10
      * global.PF_A2B10G10R10
      * global.PF_DXT1
      * global.PF_DXT2
      * global.PF_DXT3
      * global.PF_DXT4
      * global.PF_DXT5
      * global.PF_FLOAT16_RGB
      * global.PF_FLOAT16_RGBA
      * global.PF_FLOAT32_RGB
      * global.PF_FLOAT32_RGBA
      * global.PF_X8R8G8B8
      * global.PF_X8B8G8R8
      * global.PF_R8G8B8A8
      * global.PF_DEPTH
      * global.PF_SHORT_RGBA
      * global.PF_R3G3B2
      * global.PF_FLOAT16_R
      * global.PF_FLOAT32_R
      * global.PF_SHORT_GR
      * global.PF_FLOAT16_GR
      * global.PF_FLOAT32_GR
      * global.PF_SHORT_RGB 
<BR>
<BR>
=== !GetCompositionTechniqueTextureDefinition(real technique_id, real def_index) ===
----
Returns a local texture definition. 
====Parameters====
   * _technique_id_ - The ID of the technique.
   * _def_index_ - The index of the local texture definition.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !GetNumCompositionTechniqueTextureDefinitions(real technique_id) ===
----
Returns the number of local texture definition. 
====Parameters====
   * _technique_id_ - The ID of the technique.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !CreateCompositionTechniqueTargetPass(real technique_id) ===
----
Create a new target pass, and returns the ID.
====Parameters====
   * _technique_id_ - The ID of the technique.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !GetCompositionTechniqueTargetPass(real technique_id, real pass_index) ===
Returns a target pass.
====Parameters====
   * _technique_id_ - The ID of the technique.
   * _pass_index_ - The index of the texture pass.
<BR>
<BR>
=== !GetNumCompositionTechniqueTargetPasses(real technique_id) ===
----
Returns the number of texture passes. 
====Parameters====
   * _technique_id_ - The ID of the technique.
